Moved to Bedford 3 years ago, been ordering from this location since the first month. Their food is good and cconsistent. I often got the same delivery guy and he was always friendly. Never had any problems in-store or by delivery.  EDIT - …
Great pizza great service. Their pizza is the total opposite of the greasy mess Dominoes likes to serve. I had the Deluxe. The vegetables tasted so fresh. The mushrooms were beautiful 👍👍👍

I had the medium meat lovers pizza with the hand tossed crust. It was nice and warm, high quality. And it was good, though not the best I've had. I think the sauce is a bit on the sweet side, and I like my sauce savory and spicy. The meats …

I ordered a pizza, pizza bowl and cheesy bread it was all good and appropriately priced. I live in Arlington and the store in Bedford is the closest to me which is 7-8 miles away and the food is cold by the time I get it home, I wished there was one in the Six Flags area if so I would be a regular customer 🙏
Friendly staff and delicious food are definitely the qualities you want in a good pizza joint. Highly recommend Marco's Pizza to satisfy your cravings.

Good pizza. Nothing really out of the ordinary, but it tastes very good. They have three crust toppers that you can add, and we always get all three. The staff is usually polite, but sometimes there's a rude lady who really doesn't care. Pizza is always tasty though.
